general.label: General
general.comment: Please contact SmartOSC for support or if you require further customisations. Version: 3.1 Released on 24th October 2015.

logo_image_file.label: Logo image file
logo_image_file.comment: Currently only supports JPG, PNG, GIF format.

action_save_config_and_apply.label: Save and apply
action_save_config_and_apply.comment: Note: When changing settings for Barcode Conversion or changing Barcode symbology it is necessary to regenerate new product barcodes.

barcode_value.label: Barcode value
barcode_value.comment: Choose the attribute that contains the barcode value

paper_size.label: Paper size
paper_size.comment: Set paper size for printing. Default is A4

barcode_width.label: Barcode Width
barcode_width.comment: Should be smaller than Label Width

barcode_height.label: Barcode Height
barcode_height.comment: Should be smaller than Label Height

rows_display.label: Rows display:
rows_display.comment: Number of rows in print page, default is 5.

columns_display.label: Columns display:
columns_display.comment: Number of columns in print page, default is 5.

page_margin_top.label: Page margin top
page_margin_top.comment: Default is 0. Note that most printers can not print to the edge of the page, and therefore often add an extra border to the printed page.

page_margin_left.label: Page margin left
page_margin_left.comment: Default is 0. Note that most printers can not print to the edge of the page, and therefore often add an extra border to the printed page.

product_barcode_preview.comment: Enter a Product ID, then click Preview. E.g: 166

logo_settings.label: Logo position
logo_settings.comment: X, Y, e.g: 0,20

barcode_width.label: Barcode Width
barcode_width.comment: Should be smaller than Label Width

barcode_height.label: Barcode Height
barcode_height.comment: Should be smaller than Label Height

product_name_settings.label: Product name settings
product_name_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

product_name_leng.label: Product name wrap
product_name_leng.comment: e.g: 50mm. Default is null, it means showing all.

price_settings.label: Price settings
price_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

slot1_settings.label: Settings
slot1_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

slot2_settings.label: Settings
slot2_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

slot3_settings.label: Settings
slot3_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

slot4_settings.label: Settings
slot4_settings.comment: X, Y, FontSize, FontStyle, e.g: 0,5,9,BIUS

enabled_leading_digits.label: Leading Digits
enabled_leading_digits.comment: Note:This output is not working with Code 128C, i25 and EAN13.

invoice_enabled.label: Show On Invoice
invoice_enabled.comment: Select 'Yes' if you want to show barcode on Invoice

packingslip_enabled.label: Show On Packingslip
packingslip_enabled.comment: Select 'Yes' if you want to show barcode on Packingslip

include_logo.label: Include logo
include_logo.comment: Show logo along with barcode in Invoice and Packingslip

order_barcode_preview.comment: Enter a Order ID, then click Preview. E.g: 100000001

valid_duration.label: Validity Duration
valid_duration.comment: Number of days after order completion allowed to request RMA

handling_fee_default.label: Default Handling Fee Per Each Item
handling_fee_default.comment: Default handling fee for return each product
